item.title: Schein
item.description: Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds in the trickiest puzzle platformer you’ll play all year.

item.title: The Settlers Online
item.description: Journey to unknown lands and build your new home.

item.title: Coral Reef
item.description: Take a virtual deep dive into the stunning underwater world of corals

item.title: Rebuilders
item.description: Design your own vehicle and restore balance to the world.

item.title: Wildshade
item.description: Saddle your horse, ready your magic potions, and head to the starting line – will you become the next champion of Wildshade?

item.title: Luther
item.description: Outlaws! Help reformer Martin Luther and his fellows to survive their escape.

item.title: Crave
item.description: Gather Crystals and upgrade your gear to emerge victorious in this intense multiplayer shooter.

item.title: Data Clash
item.description: Get your rights together and fend off all the data miners!

item.title: Grattle
item.description: Help islands in distress to mend their eco-balance and hereby playfully learn the importance of renewable energy sources.

item.title: Milkshake
item.description: Do you want milk? – Shake cows!

item.title: Wizefloor
item.description: The interactive floor for education, games and more

item.title: Wake Time Frame
item.description: The live judging system for wakesurfing and more.

item.title: Minigames
item.description: Our hall-of-fame from game jams and other side-projects.

item.title: Press: Schein
item.description: December, 2013: Der Standard – Wer kauft heute noch Spiele um 50 Euro? * DVD-Forum – Interview mit Zeppelin Studio * WEAVE 06.13 – Casual Games PLAY AS YOU ARE * [print ed.] in-ga.me – “Schein” und “The Balloon Quest” räumen ab * GamingXP – Der Deutsche Entwicklerpreis 2013 * 4 Players – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis 2013: Wer gewann was? * Newsslash – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis 2013 * Deutscher Entwicklerpreis – Alle Gewinner 2013 * heise – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis * October, 2013: nerdLICH – Schein: Indie Jump and Run aus Österreich * Spielend programmieren – Gamecity Review * September, 2013: telekom-presse – Game City 2013: Xbox One, PS4 und zahlreiche neue Spiele * Tiroler Tageszeitung – Österreicher schicken Spieler in den Sumpf * Coop Doods – Game City 2013: Schein Entwicklerinterview * FM4 – Schlange stehen, prunkvoll spielen * Zock Around The Clock – Schein * nerdLICH – Auf der Game City 2013 inklusive Fotos * Consol.

item.title: Anti Entropy Privacy Policy
item.description: Hi, If you would like to know why we collect your private data, how we use it and who else may access it, you’ve come to the right place. Generally speaking: We value your privacy. We don’t care where you are, who you are, or what you do when you are not playing Rebuilders. We make games. We’re not a dystopian authoritarian government. We just need to save some information on servers, so you can save your progress online, and for us to evaluate the usage of our games and features.

item.title: Milkshake Privacy Policy
item.description: Hi, If you would like to know why we collect your private data, how we use it and who else may access it, you’ve come to the right place. Generally speaking: We value your privacy. We don’t care where you are, who you are, or what you do when you are not playing Milkshake. We make games. We’re not a dystopian authoritarian government. We just need to save some information on servers, so you can save your progress online, and for us to evaluate the usage of our games and features.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Do you need more information; do you have questions, or simply want to get in touch? Drop us a line!

item.title: Press Kit: Schein
item.description: Details Release Date: October 10, 2014 Genre: Puzzle Platformer Platforms: Steam , GOG , Humble Store , more… Developer: Zeppelin Studio Publisher: Meridian4 Press Contact:    /    Website: scheingame.com Facebook: facebook.com/scheingame Twitter: twitter.com/scheingame Google+: google.com/+Scheingame YouTube: youtube.com/scheingame Schein Steam Release Short Description Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds, solve challenging puzzles and defeat deadly beasts in award-winning Schein, possibly the trickiest platformer you’ll play all year.

item.title: Services
item.description: Do you need help with developing games? Drop us a line and let us know how our studio can be of assistance.

item.title: Team
item.description: Hello, we are Zeppelin Studio: a small, skilled team of professional game developers.
